unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Dhawan? Hope he recovers quickly for the upcoming series! Remember how crucial he was in the 2019 World Cup? Last I heard, he was undergoing rehab at NCA, Bangalore. Wishing him a speedy recovery, like SRK in *Kal Ho Naa Ho*. Get well soon paaji! We need those trademark cuts over point!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Dhawan? Hope he recovers quickly for the upcoming series! Remember how crucial he was in the two thousand and nineteen World Cup? Last I heard, he was undergoing rehab at N C A, Bangalore. Wishing him a speedy recovery, like S R K in *Kal Ho Naa Ho*. Get well soon paaji! We need those trademark cuts over point!
